text:
Created attachment 30680
possible fix

This code to add a listener seems odd in that it is not preserving the actual Class or Object passed in.
This has been fixed in trunk (along with some related issues) and will be included in 8.0.0-RC2. It has also been back-ported to 7.0.x where it will be included in 7.0.43 onwards.
creator: markt@apache.org
